description: Gets the configuration options for the reserved-node exchange. These options include information about the source reserved node and target reserved node offering. Details include the node type, the price, the node count, and the offering type.

parameters.name: ActionType
parameters.description: The action type of the reserved-node configuration. The action type can be an exchange initiated from either a snapshot or a resize.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: A pagination token provided by a previous GetReservedNodeExchangeConfigurationOptions request.

nested_items.name: ReservedNodeConfigurationOptionList
nested_items.description: the configuration options for the reserved-node exchange. These options include information about the source reserved node and target reserved node. Details include the node type, the price, the node count, and the offering type.

nested_items.name: SourceReservedNode
nested_items.description: Describes a reserved node. You can call the  DescribeReservedNodeOfferings API to obtain the available reserved node offerings.

nested_items.name: ReservedNodeId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the reservation.

nested_items.name: ReservedNodeOfferingId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the reserved node offering.

nested_items.name: NodeType
nested_items.description: The node type of the reserved node.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time the reservation started. You purchase a reserved node offering for a duration. This is the start time of that duration.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration of the node reservation in seconds.

nested_items.name: FixedPrice
nested_items.description: The fixed cost Amazon Redshift charges you for this reserved node.

nested_items.name: UsagePrice
nested_items.description: The hourly rate Amazon Redshift charges you for this reserved node.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code for the reserved cluster.

nested_items.name: NodeCount
nested_items.description: The number of reserved compute nodes.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the reserved compute node.
pending-payment-This reserved node has recently been purchased, and the sale has been approved, but payment has not yet been confirmed.
active-This reserved node is owned by the caller and is available for use.
payment-failed-Payment failed for the purchase attempt.
retired-The reserved node is no longer available.
exchanging-The owner is exchanging the reserved node for another reserved node.

nested_items.name: OfferingType
nested_items.description: The anticipated utilization of the reserved node, as defined in the reserved node offering.

nested_items.name: RecurringCharges
nested_items.description: The recurring charges for the reserved node.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeAmount
nested_items.description: The amount charged per the period of time specified by the recurring charge frequency.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency at which the recurring charge amount is applied.

nested_items.name: TargetReservedNodeCount
nested_items.description: The target reserved-node count.

nested_items.name: TargetReservedNodeOffering
nested_items.description: Describes a reserved node offering.

nested_items.name: ReservedNodeOfferingId
nested_items.description: The offering identifier.

nested_items.name: NodeType
nested_items.description: The node type offered by the reserved node offering.

nested_items.name: Duration
nested_items.description: The duration, in seconds, for which the offering will reserve the node.

nested_items.name: FixedPrice
nested_items.description: The upfront fixed charge you will pay to purchase the specific reserved node offering.

nested_items.name: UsagePrice
nested_items.description: The rate you are charged for each hour the cluster that is using the offering is running.

nested_items.name: CurrencyCode
nested_items.description: The currency code for the compute nodes offering.

nested_items.name: OfferingType
nested_items.description: The anticipated utilization of the reserved node, as defined in the reserved node offering.

nested_items.name: RecurringCharges
nested_items.description: The charge to your account regardless of whether you are creating any clusters using the node offering. Recurring charges are only in effect for heavy-utilization reserved nodes.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeAmount
nested_items.description: The amount charged per the period of time specified by the recurring charge frequency.

nested_items.name: RecurringChargeFrequency
nested_items.description: The frequency at which the recurring charge amount is applied.
